name: Biophysical Neurobiology
descrp: Electrochemistry and ion transport phenomena, equivalent circuits, excitability, action potentials, voltage clamp and the Hodgkin-Huxley model.  Biophysical properties of ion channels.  Statistical and electrophysiological models of synaptic transmission, Quantitative models for dendritic structure and neuronal morphogenesis.  Sensory transduction, cellular networks as computational devices, information processing and transfer.
